tags.name: fluent-tree-item
tags.title: Tree item
tags.description: The Fluent UI tree item element

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.title: Expanded
attributes.description: Whether tree item is expanded or not

attributes.name: selected
attributes.title: Selected
attributes.description: Whether tree item is selected or not

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the tree item

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The visual label of the tree item

slots.name: item
slots.title: Item slot
slots.description: Nested fluent-tree-item elements automatically apply a slot of item for an intuitive API

slots.name: expand-collapse-glyph
slots.title: Expand collapse glyph slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom visual to represent the expanded and collapsed states

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned after the expand/collapse glyph and before the item content

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the item content
